Localization.Name: RS-Barrier
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 4
Grade: Bespoke
Class: Industrial

Designed to defend against the debris common during large-scale salvage projects, Aegis Dynamics developed this bespoke industrial shield generator in-house for the Reclaimer.
